about_the_game:
Shot skibidi toilets!

Our New Games!






Enter the captivating world of "Toilet Hero", a unique game where you take on the role of a brave cameraman who fights alien creatures known as Toilets. Immerse yourself in an exciting storyline and discover amazing adventures presented in a bright arcade style.

Story🚽

It all started on the night when the sky suddenly shone with many meteors that had gone astray. However, these were not ordinary meteors. As they approached the surface of the Earth, they opened up, turning into strange, living structures - Toilets. These toilet-like creatures began to instantly attack towns and villages, turning them into chaos.


Mankind was not ready for such an invasion. The speed and aggressiveness of Toilets terrified people. World governments have joined forces, but in the face of an alien threat, human forces seemed insignificant.

It was then that people created Cameraman - creatures capable of resisting the aggression of Toilets. But they were soon defeated by an army under the command of the Holy Toilet.

Holy Toilet had the unique ability to infect people with his belief. This alien ideology turned people into lifeless toilets, merging their individuality and mind into a collective belief. Under his influence, human settlements turned into places of worship for Toilets.

You are the last of the living Cameramen and your task is not only to stop the invasion of Toilets, but also to unravel the mystery of the Holy Toilet in order to defeat him and free the infected people from this gloomy ideology.

Game Features🚽

  • 3 unique weapon
  • Cool music
  • Various Toilets
  • 6 different levels

name: Skibidi Toilet Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fast-Paced ULTRAKILL and DOOM like game where you are playing as the last Cameraman, who has to fight off the army of Skibidi Toilets using various weapons and cheerful music 🚽 (And little bit of pure brainrot)
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
